How many people are affected by chorea-acanthocytosis ?,"It is estimated that 500 to 1,000 people worldwide have chorea-acanthocytosis.",GHR,chorea-acanthocytosis
What are the genetic changes related to chorea-acanthocytosis ?,"Mutations in the VPS13A gene cause chorea-acanthocytosis. The VPS13A gene provides instructions for producing a protein called chorein; the function of this protein in the body
